Text:
this torrent requires the download of MKV player

the video was unwatchable for me, it contained large skips and stutters

ISM420: Get the K-Lite Codec Pack.

This was flawless and played perfectly fine on my HD setup.

Thanks, protoyu!
It was bugged for me too ... and I have the k-lite codec pack.
probably you should download a mkv codec then.
